title: Career paths reimagined: The changing world of work [Promoted Content]
summary_full: How might the career paths of accountancy and finance professionals in Europe change in the next five to 10 years? Based on global insights from 2,600 ACCA members and future members, together with 145 employers, this is a question that ACCA’s Career paths reimagined research explores. It shines a spotlight on a fast-evolving European career landscape, where traditional career models are giving way to more individualised and flexible paths.
